name: Save Our Tiny Planet
description:
A massive asteroid 30,000 times the size of the earth spells certain doom for our planet. Unless you can save it. Our top scientists have devised a way to move the planet but there isn't enough time to avoid the collision. Our only hope is for you to fly the planet through the tunnels of the asteroid. Good luck.

Save Our Tiny Planet is a surprisingly simple yet mercilessly difficult procedurally generated side scroller designed to put your reaction speed to the test.

Music by Bryan Teoh
